name: AUTH_REQUEST_EXT_TRN
description: Event trace data from an external system and received by Payer Platform.

columns.name: AUTH_REQUEST_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the authorization request record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: EXT_EVT_TRACE_NUM
columns.description: The event-level trace number from the external system.

columns.name: EXT_EVT_COMPANY
columns.description: The corresponding company ID for the event-level trace number from the external system.

columns.name: EXT_EVT_ADDL_IDENT
columns.description: The corresponding additional reference identifier for the event-level trace number from the external system.
